document_data.name: ''Nosfiraat's Blade''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Nosfiraat's Blade''''' was a golden-hued [[magic]]al [[scimitar]] that originated from [[Zakhara]].
document_data.Powers: ''Nosfiraat's Blade'' bore a +1 magical enchantment and critical strikes landed with this blade were especially powerful.
document_data.History:
''Nosfiraat's Blade'' was one of the golden scimitars that belonged to the famous merchant [[Daavid Ali Fazeer]] ''circa'' [[1322 DR]]. Daavid claimed the swords were found aboard a [[ghost ship]] that was sunken shortly after the merchant's excursion onto the vessel. Interestingly enough, Daavid Ali Fazeer refused to say whether the ship's crew became [[ghost]]s before or after his involvement.

In [[1372 DR]] the bale was in the possession of its namesake, the Zakharan [[vampire]] [[Nosfiraat]].
